next_steps.note: "Define the scope of 'localhost scanning': Specifically, what ports/services should be scanned? (e.g., common web ports, database ports, SSH)",
"Choose a scanning tool: Research and select a suitable tool for localhost scanning (e.g., Nmap, masscan, netcat). Document the choice and rationale.",
"Develop a basic scan command/script: Create a simple command or script using the chosen tool to perform an initial scan of the defined ports.",
"Document expected results: Before running the scan, list the services expected to be running on localhost and their corresponding ports. This will aid in verifying scan results.",

"Run the initial scan and document results: Execute the basic scan command/script and carefully record the output, noting any discrepancies from the expected results. Add findings to the 'Issues' list if needed."
